title: [垃圾排版]Celebrity Eclipse - Cruise Ship Replica | 名人新月号-游轮复制品(含...
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1204942617 于 2018-9-2 09:48 编辑 


[table=98%,SandyBrown]
  [Map Info | 地图简介] 作者原文：Hello my Subscribers and fellow ship enthusiasts! 
Today I'm proud to release my exact replica of the beautiful Celebrity Eclipse! This is a fully detailed replica that features every passenger area to the not so well known crew areas. Celebrity Eclipse is owned and operated by Celebrity Cruises and Celebrity Eclipse is the third of the Solstice-Class cruise ship, she has a total of 4 other sisters. Built by Meyerwerft in Papenburg, Germany. She was launched on February 28, 2010, and christened on April 24, 2010 by Emma Pontin in Southampton. 
Come aboard and explore the fully detailed 16 decks and set sail for new destinations and experiences. Explore the grand 12-story atrium with a live tree suspended among it, take in a gourmet 5 course meal in the Moonlight Sonata Dining Room, and feel the grass between your toes watching the sunset on The Lawn Club, an at sea first with REAL grass at sea! Afterwards whether you want to dance the night away in the Sky Observation Lounge or take in a show at the Eclipse Theater the night is yours! Be sure to explore the not so seen crew areas such as the Engine Room, Water Desalination plant, Navigational Bridge, Galleys, Medical Center and the Morgue! 

Celebrity Eclipse Specifications - 
Class and type:Solstice-class cruise ship 
Tonnage:121,878 GT[1] 
Length:317.14 m (1,040 ft 6 in)[1] 
Beam:36.80 m (120 ft 9 in)[1] 
Draft:8.30 m (27 ft 3 in)[1] 
Decks:17 decks[2] 
Installed power:4 × W?rtsil? 16V46 
67,200 kW (combined)[5] 
Propulsion:Two ABB Azipods 
Three W?rtsil? CT300 bow thrusters (3,000 kW each) 
Speed:24 knots (44 km/h; 28 mph)[4] 
Capacity:2,850 passengers[4] 
Crew:approx. 1,271While others will attempt to build Celebrity Eclipse, or any like her none will be able to attain the quality and accuracy that I've captured. Having had the opportunity to sail on her for an 11-day voyage I was able to take thousands of pictures and videos of the public areas and crew areas such as the Navigational bridge to return and complete this stunning replica. 
Thank you very much and I hope you enjoy your voyage! 

This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivs 3.0 Unported License 
Big shout out to RCISam for helping me with the amazing cover render. Be sure to check out his Profile. He's a fantastic upcoming builder in the community. Thank you Sam, you're the best!
番番译文：您好我的订阅者和同船爱好者！
今天，我很自豪地发布我对美丽的名人日食的精确复制品！这是一个完全详细的复制品，其中包括每个乘客区域，以及不太知名的船员区域。 Celebrity Eclipse由Celebrity Cruises拥有和运营，Celebrity Eclipse是Solstice-Class游轮的第三艘，她共有4个其他姐妹。由德国Papenburg的Meyerwerft建造。她于2010年2月28日推出，并于2010年4月24日由南安普敦的Emma Pontin命名。
登上并探索完全详细的16层甲板，开启新的目的地和体验。探索盛大的12层中庭，其中悬挂着活树，在Moonlight Sonata餐厅享用5道菜的美食，感受脚趾间的草地，在草坪俱乐部观看日落，在海上第一次享受REAL海上草！之后，无论您是想在Sky观景休息室跳舞，还是在Eclipse剧院观看夜晚都是您的！一定要探索不常见的船员区域，如机舱，海水淡化厂，航海桥，厨房，医疗中心和停尸房！

名人新月号规格 -
类别与类型：至尊级游轮吨位：121,878 GT长度：317.14 m (1,040 ft 6 in)梁：36.80 m (120 ft 9 in)吃水量：8.30 m (27 ft 3 in)夹板：17 decks安装功率：4 × W?rtsil? 16V46 
67,200 kW (combined)推进：Two ABB Azipods 
Three W?rtsil? CT300 bow thrusters (3,000 kW each)速度：24 knots (44 km/h; 28 mph)容量：2,850 passengers船员数量：approx. 1,271虽然其他人会尝试建立名人日食，或者像她这样的人，但是没有人能够达到我所捕获的质量和准确度。我有机会乘坐她进行为期11天的航行，我能够拍摄成千上万的公共区域和船员区域的图片和视频，例如导航桥，以便返回并完成这个令人惊叹的复制品。
非常感谢你，我希望你喜欢你的航程！

本作品采用知识共享署名 - 非商业性使用 - NoDerivs 3.0 Unported许可协议授权
非常感谢RCISam，帮助我完成惊人的封面渲染。你们一定要查看他的个人资料。他是社区中一位出色的即将到来的建设者。谢谢Sam，你是最好的！  [Picture | 美图欣赏]

  [Map Installation | 地图安装]  Save存档(正版用户):关闭Minecraft，在Windows开始菜单的搜索框中输入%appdata%/.minecraft，然后按下Enter（回车）按键。把从百度网盘下载回来的地图存档解压缩放到.minecraft\saves文件夹里面。 Schematics存档：这类型需要MCEdit。下载完成后解压到桌面，关闭Minecraft，双击mcedit.exe，点击下方import按钮，打开你下载的文件到你需要放的地方，最后点import，按Ctrl+s保存，Ctrl+w关掉存档，点Quit退出。  [Terms Of Use | 使用条款] 1. 未经作者许可，不得复制、转载、摘编、原帖内容或本帖内容进行使用2. 不能暗示此地图为您的作品或您原创，更不要将地图作为您的作品再次发布3. 您可在原作者知情的情况下将此地图用于您的服务器，也可标注地图作者名字4. 如本贴内容侵犯了版权，请联系我，确认属实后会删除所有内容并致以道歉5. 本地图转载纯属为个人行为，仅代表个人立场以及观点，与论坛官方立场无关6. 本转载帖最终解释权归本人所有，作品最终解释权归原作者所有  [The Others | 最后的话] 1. 如果您喜欢此地图，记得去官网给予钻石，回复或者订阅作者！2. 如果您是海外玩家或有条件可到官网下载，请尽量去官网下载支持原作者！3. 如您发现下载链接失效或存档损坏等，请您下方留言告知！4. 如果您想使用此地图作为公开使用请你务必要注明作者或地图官网！5. 如果您想看到更多海外优秀作品您可以关注IntelliGence Group（Bone Studio）更多海外优优秀作品任你选！————1204942617译
